ru.sharovse.spring.utils.db.values.annotations

Annotation Type ValueDbDataSource


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ValueDbDataSource
    DataSource Annotation for ValueDb.dataSourceAnnotation(). Create instance DataSource of className(). Get instance fields, find and set values ​​from properties of the same name (PropertySources). See propertyPrefix().
    Author:
    sharov1-se

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String className
      Class name DataSource.
      String name
      Name bean for symbolic link ValueDb.dataSourceAnnotation().

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String importSql
      Execute SQL script after create DataSource.
      String propertyPrefix
      Prefix for find value fields from PropertySource.
      boolean registerToContext
      Add dataSource bean to spring context.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Name bean for symbolic link ValueDb.dataSourceAnnotation(). If registerToContext()=true, DataSource bean will register into spring applicationContext by this name.
        Returns:
        valid bean name.

      • className

        public abstract String className
        Class name DataSource.
        Returns:
        String

      • propertyPrefix

        public abstract String propertyPrefix
        Prefix for find value fields from PropertySource.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • registerToContext

        public abstract boolean registerToContext
        Add dataSource bean to spring context.
        Returns:
        boolean, default no.
        Default:
        false

      • importSql

        public abstract String importSql
        Execute SQL script after create DataSource.
        Returns:
        name classpath resource.
        Default:
        ""
